name: Dungeon Hero - Classic Platform Game
description:
Now available on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stdol.dungeonhero

Jump off rising blocks before they push you to the electrified ceiling, but beware not to drop into the void! Big treasures are waiting for you at the bottom of each dungeon! Let’s run and have fun!

Game Features:

1. Unlock Epic Dungeons
60 distinctive dungeons for you to run through! More are coming soon! Can you clear them all and retrieve all treasures?

2. Endless Challenge
Play the endless mode to train your skill or just kill time! Start an ideal run by choosing from the 3 optional speed we offer! So much fun!

3. Classic Experience
A perfect mix of classic platform jumping gameplay, 16 bit graphics and vintage music! It brings back the fun and memories of the good old days!

Whether you are a casual player, fan of classic games or just want to kill time, this is the game you can’t miss! Start a run now and have fun!
